# fct_recode

### 1. Brief Description

The **fct_recode** function is an R command used to convert one factor into another. This is accomplished by assigning values of one factor to all possible values of another factor. This can be useful, for example, when dealing with qualitative data containing two-level factors, especially if the levels are more meaningful than their numeric equivalents.
